overview: Wide-eyed newcomer Gauge turns in one of her hottest performances yet in this scintillating tale of fiery sex and freaky frolicking. Gauge plays the unlikely role of the Devil's daughter, a nubile young nymph who'll stop at nothing in order to satisfy her wicked carnal desires. While Gauge may seem entirely too innocent and fresh to be any relation to Satan, once the going gets sexy she certainly knows how to turn up the heat.
title: Calamity
